programme.desc: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero / Paddington Needs a Hero - Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous? // Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Blaze and the Magic Genie - Blaze and AJ are driving through the desert when they meet a magical Genie who loves to grant wishes! But when the Genie loses the jewels that give him his powers, Blaze and AJ go on a quest to get them back!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceaera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep123
programme.desc: By the Book / Antlerless / If the Boot Doesn't Fit - After Bossy loses Turtle's library book, Bossy must find it before Turtle needs to pay. // Bossy and Turtle try to help Roller regain his confidence after losing his antlers. // Bossy outgrows a pair of boots, making him want to shrink.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1012
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hum-ata - Mayor Humdinger's birthday party goes horribly awry when Marshall Kitty gets trapped inside a life-sized piata.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1011
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Giant Cuckoo - Humdinger's Cuckoo Clock goes out of control. Ryder and the Pups must rescue Travis and get control of the Cuckoo to save Humdinger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep76
programme.desc: Backwards and Forwards - The Teletubbies have fun moving backwards and forwards. The Tubby Custard Ride goes forwards, then backwards, then forwards again!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Hair - Dee encourages a friend to say 'hair' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see all different types of hair - brown hair, pink hair and even dogs with funny hair!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Treasure Trouble - Helping Hand has organised a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Ice Ice Messy - Messy's new friend is in a spot of hot bother! They go on an icy adventure to the South Pole, the desert and the mountains to help.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - During a game of hide and seek, Monty wonders whether there is a way to hide other than in or behind something.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Cafe - In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Bubble Badge - The dog blows a lot of bubbles with his pot of bubble mixture. Though it is quite hard to do, most of the squirrels eventually get the hang of it and the clubhouse fills up with lots of bubbles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep45
programme.desc: The First Aid Badge - The squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Luckily, Duggee has his First Aid badge, so he can bandage Tag up.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Swim School - Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Circus - Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Galapagos Sea Lions - Andy blasts off in his safari sub to the Galapagos to see how sea lions deal with flies.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Electric Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that are powered by electricity! Grace rides a very unusual electric motorbike, checks out a solar plane and then drives an eco racer!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Mummy Cook and Daddy Line - Having heard about their latest shipwreck, Cook's mum and Line's dad come to the island to check if their boys are OK. Unfortunately, they are even more annoying than Cook and Line!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Climate Change, The Arctic Ocean - The Go Jetters are watching for polar bears, but an iceberg is heading for their ship!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep12
programme.desc: Salty's Surprise - It is Christmas time on the Island of Sodor and Edward and Thomas are at Brendam Docks, where Thomas is shunting trucks of presents. Salty trundles over and admires the presents train before Thomas takes it to Knapford.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Woolly Memories - Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Star Renovation - Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah can't find any of her favourite constellations...

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Nora's Plant - Nora wants to find the perfect place to grow her little plant.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Dog Loves A Kite - Pug makes a kite but he doesn't know how to fly it.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Follow the Leader - The Kazoops struggle to work as a team when building their new table tennis table.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep8
programme.desc: It's Time to Fly a Kite - JoJo and Gran Gran take Gran Gran's old kite to fly in the park where it flies away and rips, so Gran Gran sews it up. JoJo learns that if something breaks, it can sometimes be repaired!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kick Around - Team Tinpo are playing a game in their back yard when Doug-Po kicks the ball over a fence. How can they get their ball back?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Odd Ball - Rain stops play when Bo, Jo and Mo want a game of Odd Ball and Logi-Po is out of his depth looking after the three Kid Po!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Dump - On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Chinese New Year, Dragon Dance Drama - Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cheese Moon - It's a space race as Supertato helps Carrot fly her baguette rocket to be the first Veggie on the Cheese Moon but half way there Evil Pea crashes into them making them crash land.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Bloodline - When the boys send Dave's DNA sample to a testing lab the results show he's related to Jack The Ripper!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep526
programme.desc: The Dinner / The Tour - Alvin invites Dave's old high school rival to an elaborate dinner to prove to him that Dave is a huge success. // The Chipmunks can't wait to go on a World tour until Theodore and Alvin realize what they'll be leaving behind.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Deserted / The Great Snack Off - After getting detention again, Alvin's convinced Dave will drive him to the desert and abandon him there. // Alvin and Theodore play a seemingly innocent game, which leads to unexpected consequences.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep269
programme.desc: Under the Small Top / Squidward's Sick Daze - Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus meant for SpongeBob. // Squidward fakes being sick to get out of work, but his agony only begins when SpongeBob arrives to care for him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep270
programme.desc: Goofy Scoopers / Pat the Dog - SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fires robot band from Goofy Goober's. // Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he won't be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: Who R Zoo? - The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep104
programme.desc: In Search of Camp Noodist / Kitchen Sponge - SpongeBob, Sandy, and Patrick hike through the woods in search of a fabled nudist colony. // SpongeBob helps Plankton at the Krusty Kanteen, leading to the development of a very familiar sandwich.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Much Ado About Noshing / Broadcast Blues - The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynn's Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Camped! - When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. // They soon uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it and prove the existence of an old camp legend.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Diss the Cook / For Sale by Loner - Lincoln is convinced the middle school lunch lady is holding a grudge against him and his older sisters. // Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep312

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Submission Specialists - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep505JoseAldoKingsMMAAndersonSilva
programme.desc: Jose Aldo gives us insight into his unique relationship with coach and lifelong friend Dede Pederneiras. Master Rafael Cordeiro gives a detailed history of world-renowned gym Kings MMA. UFC fighters explain why ten-time middleweight title defender Anderson Silva, was so iconic to the world of MMA.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC285JonesvsGane
programme.desc: At UFC 285, former 205-pound champ Jon Jones moves up to face Ciryl Gane for the heavyweight belt in the main event. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will face Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep9
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts EpUFCUltimateKnockoutsEpisode903HispaniceHeritageMonthPt1
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts returns with part one of our Hispanic Heritage Month celebration. See incredible KOs from Yair Rodriguez, Cub Swanson, Marlon Chito Vera, and more.

programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women
programme.desc: AI PEPPERS vs RED SPARKS - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: BUNDESLIGA: 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION
programme.desc: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION - Goals, saves and other superhuman feats that have graced the Bundesliga. Since inception in 1963, who stands atop the Bundesliga charts?

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Main Event - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: Episode 901: UFC 256 Figueiredo vs Moreno 1 - An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.
